idea: COOL CARGO PRIVATE LIMITED is an innovative company involving in the Doorstep Diesel Delivery. Dealing in the delivery of Diesel to the door step of the customers who run heavy vehicles, agricultural machinery, we are venturing into the business of Mobile Fuel Dispenser to delivery Diesel (HSD) to Businesses which follow traditional ways of fueling their machinery. The concept of door step diesel delivery is novel in our area of business and will help us generate employment. We will hire trained drivers, operators, admin, and security staff to run the business.
name: COOL CARGO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
My Self *Junaid Mansuri Proprietor Of SGM Group (Visa & Ticketing) From Mumbai, India*. Everyone Know, We Are Surrounded By Fraud Agents Especially In Delhi/Maharashtra/Gujarat/Punjab. No One Take Action, We Just Put Status Or Post On Social Media And Fraud Agents Keep Doing Frauds.

So, With This Motive *Fraud Free Travel Industry* And A Vision *One Day There Will Be No Frauds In The Travel Industry* I Have Start An Association:

 *Association Of Travel Agent Preventing Fraud Tourism*

ü§ù With The Help Of This Association, We Will Fight With Fraud Travel Agents And Save Good Travel Agents In India
name: Association Of Travel Agent Preventing Fraud Tourism

idea:

The Company provide short-tenure loans to merchants based on the digital payments that happen at their outlets.

idea: We at Laffale Lightings Deal in all types of LED Lightings for Homes, Offices, Factories and Hotels; providing Lightings as per custom requirements. idea:
Alpha Shot is an IT and IoT based start-up.
Founded by the team of 3 people with the background of Engineering and Finance fields.

  • Our Product is already proven successful in the international market, with increase in demand for vehicle security with affordability will turn out our product into a successful business idea in Domestic market.

  • Where in India there is a vast gap between  the demand and supply for dashcam in the market, which we encountered through our market research and we are aiming to fill that with our product.

  • The Dash cam market in India can be scaled by keeping in mind the number of owners private car, commercial car, ambulance, truck and bus and the most important factor to give an competitive edge is price.

  • As Indian market is highly price sensitive market were we stand strong in comparison to our competitors
name: Alpha-Shot
